name: Race4Life
description:
2D pixel art racing/dirfting simulator. The game is set in desert and has day and night cycle.

Info

I made this mainly because I never made racing/drifting game before so I wanted to know what I can do. For now there is only the car and the desert in the game.

Controls
  • w - accelerate
  • a - left
  • d - right
  • space - drift, reverse
